column1: Problematically, for #covid19 in the US millions of underinsured or uninsured food sector, elder care, or service sector workers can't afford to check if flu/cold like symptoms are #coronavirus. Impediments to access could represent an issue to rapid identification and isolation.

Wuhan appears to be in the 3-4 cigarettes a day range as far as air quality is concerned. Older urban Chinese men have the highest smoking rates. They are also the group with the highest rates of mortality from the #coronavirus #COVID19 respiratory infection.

Air quality estimates vary, but baseline conditions in China are compared to smoking habits ranging between 2.4 to 65 cigarettes a day depending on where you are and how bad the air quality is that day. These issues may be worsening #coronavirus #COVID19
